LanguageData.Plant_AYWormwood.label: Wormwood
LanguageData.Plant_AYWormwood.description: Artemisia absinthium (wormwood, grand wormwood, absinthe, absinthium, absinthe wormwood) is a species of Artemisia native to temperate regions and warmer climates. It is grown as an ornamental plant and is used as an ingredient in medicinal remedies, the spirit absinthe as well as some other alcoholic beverages.
